SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DBName" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DSN" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DSN# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DSN#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DSN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Produc ID" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_PRODUCT_ID# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_PRODUCT_ID#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_PRODUCT_ID#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Request Category" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATEGORY# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATEGORY#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATEGORY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Name" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_NAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Catalouge" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATALOGUE_TYPE# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATALOGUE_TYPE#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_CATALOGUE_TYPE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filename" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_FILENAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_FILENAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_FILENAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Option Arguments" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_ARGS# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_RPT_ARGS#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_RPT_ARGS#
echo "********************************"
